fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may choose to Stone Gaze a player at night. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player you Stone Gaze dies that night, their Role and Last Will are hidden upon death to all non-Coven members.
- With the Necronomicon, you will also deal a Basic Attack to your target. You may attack a target even if you are out of Stone Gazes.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
